trans-unit.source: Defines the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicates the applications that use the key.
An enhanced key usage (EKU) extension is a collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class.
Use this method to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class.

After the instance has been created, you can then use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A> property to obtain the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
Use this constructor if the information to create the extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
The encoded data to use to create the extension.
`true` if the extension is critical; otherwise, `false`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
`true` if the extension is critical; otherwise, `false`.
The specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> contains one or more corrupt values.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
The encoded data to use to create the extension.
Gets the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object indicating the applications that use the key.
